title: UK Heritage Sheffield Retreat with Onsite Cocktail Lounge
description: Discover regal splendour in the heart of South Yorkshire with a stay at the historic Crowne Plaza Royal Victoria Sheffield, an IHG Hotel. Originally built in 1862 and still proudly serving guests today, this sanctuary features just 105 rooms, each offering a tantalising glimpse into the idyllic charms of yesteryear. Head to Cunningham’s Restaurant for scones and seasonal high tea or sink into a fireside leather chesterfield at the Grand Lounge and sip the evening away.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Royal Victoria Sheffield, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Victoria Station Road, Sheffield S4 7YE, United Kingdom

title: Comfortable Riverside Hotel within Central Sheffield
description: Venture into the great outdoors and wonder at Victorian facades in the UK’s greenest city at Holiday Inn Express Sheffield City Centre, an IHG Hotel. Journey through the Peak District National Park by bike, stopping at centuries-old villages and coves, learn about the city’s illustrious history at nearby museums and take a trip to the grand Bolsover Castle. Then unwind with a pint on the hotel's patio and start the next day refreshed with a hot buffet breakfast.
location_description: Holiday Inn Express Sheffield City Centre, an IHG Hotel
